Package ohos.wifi

Executes or configures Wi-Fi.

  • WifiDevice: This class provides methods for obtaining Wi-Fi status and information, such as checking whether Wi-Fi is enabled, obtaining the list of information about access points detected in a Wi-Fi scan, and checking whether a Wi-Fi connection has been set up.
  • WifiLinkedInfo: Provides information about the peer hotspot connected to the current device, such as SSID, BSSID, and RSSI of the peer hotspot.
  • WifiScanInfo: Stores information about the scanned Wi-Fi hotspot, such as SSID and BSSID.
  • IpInfo: Provides information about a Wi-Fi connection that has been set up, such as the IP address, gateway address, and DNS server address.
  • WifiEvents: Provides the constants used for Wi-Fi management, such as the broadcast name, encryption mode, and frequency band.

    • Since:
    1
    • Class Summary 
      Class Description
      IpInfo
      Provides IP information of a Wi-Fi connection.
      WifiDevice
      Provides interfaces to manage Wi-Fi.
      WifiDeviceConfig
      Provides the configuration of a Wi-Fi access point.
      WifiEvents
      Provides parameters for Wi-Fi interfaces.
      WifiLinkedInfo
      Provides information about a Wi-Fi connection.
      WifiScanInfo
      Obtains detailed information of a Wi-Fi access point detected by Wi-Fi scanning.
      WifiSecurity
      Provides security parameters for Wi-Fi interfaces.
      WifiUtils
      Provides common parameters and util functions for Wi-Fi interfaces.
    • Enum Summary 
      Enum Description
      WifiLinkedInfo.ConnState
      Enumerates the Wi-Fi connection states.
      WifiSecurity.EapMethod
      Indicates the EAP methods, including NONE, PEAP, TLS, TTLS, PWD, SIM, AKA, AKA_PRIME, and UNAUTH_TLS.
      WifiSecurity.Phase2Method
      Indicates the inner authentication methods, including NONE, PAP, MSCHAP, MSCHAPV2, GTC, SIM, AKA, and AKA_PRIME.
